update hs_user_rights set sys_id = #{record.sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, branch = #{record.branch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_num = #{record.customerNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, customer_name = #{record.customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, asset_account = #{record.assetAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rights_market = #{record.rightsMarket,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rights_account = #{record.rightsAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rights_code = #{record.rightsCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, rights_name = #{record.rightsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, current_num = #{record.currentNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, available_num = #{record.availableNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, consign_sell_num = #{record.consignSellNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, cost = #{record.cost,jdbcType=BIGINT}, trans_date = #{record.transDate,jdbcType=DATE}, backup1 = #{record.backup1,jdbcType=CHAR}, backup2 = #{record.backup2,jdbcType=CHAR}, backup3 = #{record.backup3,jdbcType=CHAR}, backup4 = #{record.backup4,jdbcType=CHAR}, backup5 = #{record.backup5,jdbcType=CHAR}, backup6 = #{record.backup6,jdbcType=CHAR}, backup7 = #{record.backup7,jdbcType=CHAR}
update hs_user_rights set available_num = (available_num - #{availableNum}) where sys_id = #{sysId} and customer_num = #{customerNum} and rights_code = #{rightsCode}
mapper.select: select sys_id as sysId,branch,customer_num customerNum,customer_name customerName,asset_account assetAccount,rights_market rightMarket,rights_account rightsAccount,rights_code rightCode,rights_name rightsName,current_num currentNum,available_num avaliableNum,consign_sell_num consignSellNum,cost,trans_date transDate from hs_user_rights where sys_id = #{sysId} and customer_num = #{customerNum} and rights_code = #{rightsCode}
